name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 99 Names of Allah + Prayer Times Homepage

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows one of the 99 names of Allah and its translation, prayer times and a beautiful background image on every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows on of the 99 names of Allah, its translation in English and Prayer (Salah) Times with a beautiful background image on every new tab.

Features:
• Supports both manual and automatic location
• Supports multiple fonts for people from across the globe
• Hijri date
• Works on laptops and desktops
